name: 3D Go-kart City Racing - Outdoor Traffic Speed Karting Simulator Game FREE
name_original: 3D Go-kart City Racing - Outdoor Traffic Speed Karting Simulator Game FREE
description:
Burn up the road like a madman in this 3D Go-Kart Game. Race at insane speeds down real city roads. Be careful not to get flattened by traffic. Hurry, time is running out, how fast can you go.

Features:
-Incredible 3D City environment
-3 different karts to choose from
-Dynamic Traffic
